function.name: search_internet_google_api
function.description: Search the internet using Google's Custom Search API (high quality results, requires API key). Use this when you need reliable, high-quality search results from Google. Note: Limited to 100 free queries per day, then $5 per 1000 queries.

query.description: The search query. Be specific and clear about what you're looking for.

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-10). Defaults to 5.
